amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language that would require the Forest Service and the Bureau of Land Management to perform regulatory flexibility analyses for forest and land management plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-2 to strike language that would require the Forest Service and the Bureau of Land Management to perform regulatory flexibility analyses for forest and land management plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 43).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 43).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
